location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires, Tehran

mods.abstract: Riach forwards a detailed account [not transcribed] of the money transactions that had taken place at that Presidency on account of subsidiary payments, the receipts of those who had received payment of his drafts, all the bills on the Bengal and Bombay Governments remaining unsold, and other relevant documents. He also gives details of the financial transactions undertaken by Catchatoor Johannes.
